about_the_game: The Arrogant Kaiju Princess and The Detective Servant" Setting Collection delves deep into the mysteries behind this captivating work. This collection offers readers an exclusive opportunity to explore the creative background, character development, and world-building of the story. Through detailed illustrations, design drafts, and insights from the author, readers can gain a comprehensive understanding of the intricate relationship between the arrogant kaiju princess and the detective servant, as well as the fantastical world they inhabit. This setting collection is an ideal choice for those seeking to unravel the depths of the novel

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters are over 20 years old.
Content Warning: This game contains sexual scenes.
please make sure you are in the right place to avoid any unnecessary attention.
